author: Jason Holt
description:
Firefighters, EMT and hazmat workers around the world hold competitions to show off their skills in performing their job.  Our event would involve healthcare tasks specific to caring for ebola patients in the field, and would encourage innovative new protocols and equipment.

Teams must complete a gauntlet of ebola-related healthcare tasks (replacing an IV, cleaning a patient, moving a patient) in the least time.  The environment will be contaminated with Glo Germ, and teams must doff all their gear before the clock stops.  Any Glo Germ contamination on their bodies means disqualification or penalties.

Additional prizes would be given for innovative new equipment which improves performance or minimizes cost.
summary: Host an athletic event where teams complete a gauntlet of ebola-related healthcare tasks while donning, wearing and doffing full PPE.
title: PPE Olympics
